summary: Water quality parameters are stable and within acceptable ranges for Blue Nile tilapia and the selected plants.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal growth.
Keep TDS levels between 200-400 ppm for healthy fish and plant growth.
Maintain water temperature between 24-30°C for optimal tilapia health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.041 / 7.016 / 7.08 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 311.576 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.242 / 24.19 / 30.06 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
